SEARCH
Package gw.api.assignment

Class AssignmentSearchResult

java.lang.Object
com.guidewire.pl.system.database.impl.QueryProcessorBase<Bean>
com.guidewire.pl.system.database.impl.WrappingQueryProcessor<Bean>
gw.api.assignment.AssignmentSearchResult
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.guidewire.pl.system.database.impl.IQueryBeanResultInternal<Bean>, com.guidewire.pl.system.database.impl.IQueryResultInternal<Bean,Bean>, com.guidewire.pl.system.database.IWrappedQueryResult<Bean,Bean>, IQueryBeanResult<Bean>, IQueryResult<Bean,Bean>, IQueryResultSet<Bean>, Serializable, Iterable<Bean>
public class AssignmentSearchResult extends com.guidewire.pl.system.database.impl.WrappingQueryProcessor<Bean>
Actually performs a search based on an AssignmentSearchCriteria object. The criteria will specify a type of assignee to search for - "User", "Group" or "Queue". AssignmentSearchResult has methods to retrieve results of each of these types, but it will only return actual results for the type of assignee selected by the criteria. For example, if the criteria specify a "User" search then the methods for returning groups and queues will return empty query processors, while the method for returning users will return a real query processor that may return users (assuming any match the criteria). This captures the information needed to handle the result operations at creation time, and presents the result as a query processor of beans and the previous individual accessors.
See Also:

    • getUsers

      public IQueryBeanResult<GroupUser> getUsers()
